item.title: Dog fouling and dog waste bags, 12th February
item.description:
There are multiple incidents of dog fouling along this stretch more towards Aldersmead Road. On the corner of Aldersmead Rd there are also a couple of dog waste bags that have been used and then dropped on the pavement. On the opposite side of the road close to #40 Kings Hall Rd, there is more dog fouling. As this location is near a nursery and is part of the school run for many parents heading to Alexandra infants and other local schools this is a serious issue. The problem has got worse over the last 4 weeks. I believe it to be a single irresponsible dog owner who walks their dog in the evening.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kings Hall Road, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Kerb Damaged By Sainsbury's Delivery Trucks, 12th February
item.description:
Original granite kerb has been destroyed by trucks delivering to Sainsbury's that bump up up the kerb and hit it with tail-lifts and heavy trolleys. Just been replaced with a bodged tarmac repair that has been there for months.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 328, Lordship Lane, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Domestic waste regularly being dumped next to public bin, 12th February
item.description:
Another bag of domestic waste left beside this public bin on Bycroft St. Seems like local residents are doing this several times a week, perhaps need better household bin provision/collection in the area?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bycroft Street, Penge, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Christchurch avenue parking area on sides of road, 12th February
item.description:
Someone has placed nails in the road so multiple cars are getting flat tyres. This is especially targeting parents of children in the special school who are attending the school for meeting or to drop and pick up children
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Christchurch Avenue, London
